title: Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 days. I interviewed at Ecosphere in Jun 2012
Interview Descriptions:
University Level: Two rounds interview. One is 1 to 1, after that, group panel (Project base).
Company Level: Sent your resume through the university. They will choose the students they like. Then conduct a phone interview, then we go to their place, 1-1 interview.
Interview Questions: Why do you apply for this internship programme?
